alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Jackson, northern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, east central Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 730 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Hartford to near De Funiak Springs. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Marianna, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Freeport, Cottondale, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Westville, Ebro, Noma and Moose Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; Washington
